00059  * Util functions.                    *

00062 /* Util macro. */
00063 #define OUT_OF_MEMORY() ((void)printf("WeightVGProximity: Out of memory.\n"))
00064 
00068 static void get_vert2geom_distance(int numVerts, float (*v_cos)[3],
00069                                    float *dist_v, float *dist_e, float *dist_f,
00070                                    DerivedMesh *target, const SpaceTransform *loc2trgt)
00071 {
00072     int i;
00073     BVHTreeFromMesh treeData_v = NULL_BVHTreeFromMesh;
00074     BVHTreeFromMesh treeData_e = NULL_BVHTreeFromMesh;
00075     BVHTreeFromMesh treeData_f = NULL_BVHTreeFromMesh;
00076     BVHTreeNearest  nearest_v  = NULL_BVHTreeNearest;
00077     BVHTreeNearest  nearest_e  = NULL_BVHTreeNearest;
00078     BVHTreeNearest  nearest_f  = NULL_BVHTreeNearest;
00079 
00080     if (dist_v) {
00081         /* Create a bvh-tree of the given target's verts. */
00082         bvhtree_from_mesh_verts(&treeData_v, target, 0.0, 2, 6);
00083         if (treeData_v.tree == NULL) {
00084             OUT_OF_MEMORY();
00085             return;
00086         }
00087     }
00088     if (dist_e) {
00089         /* Create a bvh-tree of the given target's edges. */
00090         bvhtree_from_mesh_edges(&treeData_e, target, 0.0, 2, 6);
00091         if (treeData_e.tree == NULL) {
00092             OUT_OF_MEMORY();
00093             return;
00094         }
00095     }
00096     if (dist_f) {
00097         /* Create a bvh-tree of the given target's faces. */
00098         bvhtree_from_mesh_faces(&treeData_f, target, 0.0, 2, 6);
00099         if (treeData_f.tree == NULL) {
00100             OUT_OF_MEMORY();
00101             return;
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     /* Setup nearest. */
00106     nearest_v.index = nearest_e.index = nearest_f.index = -1;
00107     /*nearest_v.dist  = nearest_e.dist  = nearest_f.dist  = FLT_MAX;*/
00108     /* Find the nearest vert/edge/face. */
00109 #ifndef __APPLE__
00110 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) private(i) firstprivate(nearest_v,nearest_e,nearest_f) \
00111                          shared(treeData_v,treeData_e,treeData_f,numVerts,v_cos,dist_v,dist_e, \
00112                                 dist_f,loc2trgt) \
00113                          schedule(static)
00114 #endif
00115     for (i = 0; i < numVerts; ++i) {
00116         float tmp_co[3];
00117 
00118         /* Convert the vertex to tree coordinates. */
00119         copy_v3_v3(tmp_co, v_cos[i]);
00120         space_transform_apply(loc2trgt, tmp_co);
00121 
00122         /* Use local proximity heuristics (to reduce the nearest search).
00123          *
00124          * If we already had an hit before, we assume this vertex is going to have a close hit to
00125          * that other vertex, so we can initiate the "nearest.dist" with the expected value to that
00126          * last hit.
00127          * This will lead in prunning of the search tree.
00128          */
00129         if (dist_v) {
00130             nearest_v.dist = nearest_v.index != -1 ? len_squared_v3v3(tmp_co, nearest_v.co) : FLT_MAX;
00131             /* Compute and store result. If invalid (-1 idx), keep FLT_MAX dist. */
00132             BLI_bvhtree_find_nearest(treeData_v.tree, tmp_co, &nearest_v, treeData_v.nearest_callback, &treeData_v);
00133             dist_v[i] = sqrtf(nearest_v.dist);
00134         }
00135         if (dist_e) {
00136             nearest_e.dist = nearest_e.index != -1 ? len_squared_v3v3(tmp_co, nearest_e.co) : FLT_MAX;
00137             /* Compute and store result. If invalid (-1 idx), keep FLT_MAX dist. */
00138             BLI_bvhtree_find_nearest(treeData_e.tree, tmp_co, &nearest_e, treeData_e.nearest_callback, &treeData_e);
00139             dist_e[i] = sqrtf(nearest_e.dist);
00140         }
00141         if (dist_f) {
00142             nearest_f.dist = nearest_f.index != -1 ? len_squared_v3v3(tmp_co, nearest_f.co) : FLT_MAX;
00143             /* Compute and store result. If invalid (-1 idx), keep FLT_MAX dist. */
00144             BLI_bvhtree_find_nearest(treeData_f.tree, tmp_co, &nearest_f, treeData_f.nearest_callback, &treeData_f);
00145             dist_f[i] = sqrtf(nearest_f.dist);
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149     if (dist_v)
00150         free_bvhtree_from_mesh(&treeData_v);
00151     if (dist_e)
00152         free_bvhtree_from_mesh(&treeData_e);
00153     if (dist_f)
00154         free_bvhtree_from_mesh(&treeData_f);
00155 }
00156 
00161 static void get_vert2ob_distance(int numVerts, float (*v_cos)[3], float *dist,
00162                                  Object* ob, Object* obr)
00163 {
00164     /* Vertex and ref object coordinates. */
00165     float v_wco[3];
00166     unsigned int i= numVerts;
00167 
00168     while (i-- > 0) {
00169         /* Get world-coordinates of the vertex (constraints and anim included). */
00170         mul_v3_m4v3(v_wco, ob->obmat, v_cos[i]);
00171         /* Return distance between both coordinates. */
00172         dist[i] = len_v3v3(v_wco, obr->obmat[3]);
00173     }
00174 }
00175 
00180 static float get_ob2ob_distance(const Object* ob, const Object* obr)
00181 {
00182     return len_v3v3(ob->obmat[3], obr->obmat[3]); 
00183 }
00184 
00188 void do_map(float *weights, const int nidx, const float min_d, const float max_d, short mode)
00189 {
00190     const float range_inv= 1.0f / (max_d - min_d); /* invert since multiplication is faster */
00191     unsigned int i= nidx;
00192     if (max_d == min_d) {
00193         while (i-- > 0) {
00194             weights[i] = (weights[i] >= max_d) ? 1.0f : 0.0f; /* "Step" behavior... */
00195         }
00196     }
00197     else if (max_d > min_d) {
00198         while (i-- > 0) {
00199             if     (weights[i] >= max_d) weights[i]= 1.0f; /* most likely case first */
00200             else if (weights[i] <= min_d) weights[i]= 0.0f;
00201             else                         weights[i]= (weights[i] - min_d) * range_inv;
00202         }
00203     }
00204     else {
00205         while (i-- > 0) {
00206             if     (weights[i] <= max_d) weights[i]= 1.0f; /* most likely case first */
00207             else if (weights[i] >= min_d) weights[i]= 0.0f;
00208             else                         weights[i]= (weights[i] - min_d) * range_inv;
00209         }
00210     }
00211 
00212     if (!ELEM(mode, MOD_WVG_MAPPING_NONE, MOD_WVG_MAPPING_CURVE)) {
00213         weightvg_do_map(nidx, weights, mode, NULL);
00214     }
00215 }

00217 /**************************************
00218  * Modifiers functions.               *
00219  **************************************/
00220 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00221 {
00222     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00223 
00224     wmd->proximity_mode       = MOD_WVG_PROXIMITY_OBJECT;
00225     wmd->proximity_flags      = MOD_WVG_PROXIMITY_GEOM_VERTS;
00226 
00227     wmd->falloff_type         = MOD_WVG_MAPPING_NONE;
00228 
00229     wmd->mask_constant        = 1.0f;
00230     wmd->mask_tex_use_channel = MOD_WVG_MASK_TEX_USE_INT; /* Use intensity by default. */
00231     wmd->mask_tex_mapping     = MOD_DISP_MAP_LOCAL;
00232     wmd->max_dist             = 1.0f; /* vert arbitrary distance, but don't use 0 */
00233 }
00234 
00235 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00236 {
00237     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd  = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00238     WeightVGProximityModifierData *twmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) target;
00239 
00240     BLI_strncpy(twmd->defgrp_name, wmd->defgrp_name, sizeof(twmd->defgrp_name));
00241     twmd->proximity_mode         = wmd->proximity_mode;
00242     twmd->proximity_flags        = wmd->proximity_flags;
00243     twmd->proximity_ob_target    = wmd->proximity_ob_target;
00244 
00245     twmd->falloff_type           = wmd->falloff_type;
00246 
00247     twmd->mask_constant          = wmd->mask_constant;
00248     BLI_strncpy(twmd->mask_defgrp_name, wmd->mask_defgrp_name, sizeof(twmd->mask_defgrp_name));
00249     twmd->mask_texture           = wmd->mask_texture;
00250     twmd->mask_tex_use_channel   = wmd->mask_tex_use_channel;
00251     twmd->mask_tex_mapping       = wmd->mask_tex_mapping;
00252     twmd->mask_tex_map_obj       = wmd->mask_tex_map_obj;
00253     BLI_strncpy(twmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name, wmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name, sizeof(twmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name));
00254     twmd->min_dist               = wmd->min_dist;
00255     twmd->max_dist               = wmd->max_dist;
00256 }
00257 
00258 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00259 {
00260     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00261     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00262 
00263     /* We need vertex groups! */
00264     dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00265 
00266     /* Ask for UV coordinates if we need them. */
00267     if (wmd->mask_tex_mapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_UV)
00268         dataMask |= CD_MASK_MTFACE;
00269 
00270     /* No need to ask for CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL... */
00271 
00272     return dataMask;
00273 }

00275 static int dependsOnTime(ModifierData *md)
00276 {
00277     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00278 
00279     if (wmd->mask_texture)
00280         return BKE_texture_dependsOnTime(wmd->mask_texture);
00281     return 0;
00282 }

00284 static void foreachObjectLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00285                               void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin),
00286                               void *userData)
00287 {
00288     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00289     walk(userData, ob, &wmd->proximity_ob_target);
00290     walk(userData, ob, &wmd->mask_tex_map_obj);
00291 }
00292 
00293 static void foreachIDLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, IDWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00294 {
00295     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00296 
00297     walk(userData, ob, (ID **)&wmd->mask_texture);
00298 
00299     foreachObjectLink(md, ob, (ObjectWalkFunc)walk, userData);
00300 }
00301 
00302 static void foreachTexLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, TexWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00303 {
00304     walk(userData, ob, md, "mask_texture");
00305 }
00306 
00307 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest, struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00308                            Object *UNUSED(ob), DagNode *obNode)
00309 {
00310     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00311     DagNode *curNode;
00312 
00313     if (wmd->proximity_ob_target) {
00314         curNode = dag_get_node(forest, wmd->proximity_ob_target);
00315         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode, DAG_RL_DATA_DATA|DAG_RL_OB_DATA,
00316                          "WeightVGProximity Modifier");
00317     }
00318 
00319     if (wmd->mask_tex_map_obj && wmd->mask_tex_mapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_OBJECT) {
00320         curNode = dag_get_node(forest, wmd->mask_tex_map_obj);
00321 
00322         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode, DAG_RL_DATA_DATA|DAG_RL_OB_DATA,
00323                          "WeightVGProximity Modifier");
00324     }
00325 
00326     if (wmd->mask_tex_mapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_GLOBAL)
00327         dag_add_relation(forest, obNode, obNode, DAG_RL_DATA_DATA|DAG_RL_OB_DATA,
00328                          "WeightVGProximity Modifier");
00329 }
00330 
00331 static int isDisabled(ModifierData *md, int UNUSED(useRenderParams))
00332 {
00333     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00334     /* If no vertex group, bypass. */
00335     if (wmd->defgrp_name[0] == '\0') return 1;
00336     /* If no target object, bypass. */
00337     return (wmd->proximity_ob_target == NULL);
00338 }
00339 
00340 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00341                                   int UNUSED(useRenderParams), int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00342 {
00343     WeightVGProximityModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGProximityModifierData*) md;
00344     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData;
00345     MDeformVert *dvert = NULL;
00346     MDeformWeight **dw, **tdw;
00347     int numVerts;
00348     float (*v_cos)[3] = NULL; /* The vertices coordinates. */
00349     Object *obr = NULL; /* Our target object. */
00350     int defgrp_idx;
00351     float *tw = NULL;
00352     float *org_w = NULL;
00353     float *new_w =NULL;
00354     int *tidx, *indices = NULL;
00355     int numIdx = 0;
00356     int i;
00357     /* Flags. */
00358 #if 0
00359     int do_prev = (wmd->modifier.mode & eModifierMode_DoWeightPreview);
00360 #endif
00361 
00362 #if DO_PROFILE
00363     TIMEIT_START(perf)
00364 #endif
00365 
00366     /* Get number of verts. */
00367     numVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00368 
00369     /* Check if we can just return the original mesh.
00370      * Must have verts and therefore verts assigned to vgroups to do anything useful!
00371      */
00372     if ((numVerts == 0) || (ob->defbase.first == NULL))
00373         return dm;
00374 
00375     /* Get our target object. */
00376     obr = wmd->proximity_ob_target;
00377     if (obr == NULL)
00378         return dm;
00379 
00380     /* Get vgroup idx from its name. */
00381     defgrp_idx = defgroup_name_index(ob, wmd->defgrp_name);
00382     if (defgrp_idx < 0)
00383         return dm;
00384 
00385     dvert = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MDEFORMVERT, numVerts);
00386     /* If no vertices were ever added to an object's vgroup, dvert might be NULL.
00387      * As this modifier never add vertices to vgroup, just return. */
00388     if (!dvert)
00389         return dm;
00390 
00391     /* Find out which vertices to work on (all vertices in vgroup), and get their relevant weight.
00392      */
00393     tidx = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * numVerts, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, tidx");
00394     tw = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numVerts, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, tw");
00395     tdw = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numVerts, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, tdw");
00396     for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00397         MDeformWeight *_dw = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx);
00398         if (_dw) {
00399             tidx[numIdx] = i;
00400             tw[numIdx] = _dw->weight;
00401             tdw[numIdx++] = _dw;
00402         }
00403     }
00404     /* If no vertices found, return org data! */
00405     if (numIdx == 0) {
00406         MEM_freeN(tidx);
00407         MEM_freeN(tw);
00408         MEM_freeN(tdw);
00409         return dm;
00410     }
00411     if (numIdx != numVerts) {
00412         indices = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, indices");
00413         memcpy(indices, tidx, sizeof(int) * numIdx);
00414         org_w = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, org_w");
00415         memcpy(org_w, tw, sizeof(float) * numIdx);
00416         dw = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, dw");
00417         memcpy(dw, tdw, sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numIdx);
00418         MEM_freeN(tw);
00419         MEM_freeN(tdw);
00420     }
00421     else {
00422         org_w = tw;
00423         dw = tdw;
00424     }
00425     new_w = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, new_w");
00426     MEM_freeN(tidx);
00427 
00428     /* Get our vertex coordinates. */
00429     v_cos = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float[3]) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, v_cos");
00430     if (numIdx != numVerts) {
00431         /* XXX In some situations, this code can be up to about 50 times more performant
00432          *     than simply using getVertCo for each affected vertex...
00433          */
00434         float (*tv_cos)[3] = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float[3]) * numVerts, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, tv_cos");
00435         dm->getVertCos(dm, tv_cos);
00436         for (i = 0; i < numIdx; i++)
00437             copy_v3_v3(v_cos[i], tv_cos[indices[i]]);
00438         MEM_freeN(tv_cos);
00439     }
00440     else
00441         dm->getVertCos(dm, v_cos);
00442 
00443     /* Compute wanted distances. */
00444     if (wmd->proximity_mode == MOD_WVG_PROXIMITY_OBJECT) {
00445         const float dist = get_ob2ob_distance(ob, obr);
00446         for (i = 0; i < numIdx; i++)
00447             new_w[i] = dist;
00448     }
00449     else if (wmd->proximity_mode == MOD_WVG_PROXIMITY_GEOMETRY) {
00450         const short use_trgt_verts = (wmd->proximity_flags & MOD_WVG_PROXIMITY_GEOM_VERTS);
00451         const short use_trgt_edges = (wmd->proximity_flags & MOD_WVG_PROXIMITY_GEOM_EDGES);
00452         const short use_trgt_faces = (wmd->proximity_flags & MOD_WVG_PROXIMITY_GEOM_FACES);
00453 
00454         if (use_trgt_verts || use_trgt_edges || use_trgt_faces) {
00455             DerivedMesh *target_dm = obr->derivedFinal;
00456             short free_target_dm = FALSE;
00457             if (!target_dm) {
00458                 if (ELEM3(obr->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT))
00459                     target_dm = CDDM_from_curve(obr);
00460                 else if (obr->type == OB_MESH) {
00461                     Mesh *me = (Mesh*)obr->data;
00462                     if (me->edit_btmesh)
00463                         target_dm = CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(me->edit_btmesh, me, FALSE, FALSE);
00464                     else
00465                         target_dm = CDDM_from_mesh(me, obr);
00466                 }
00467                 free_target_dm = TRUE;
00468             }
00469 
00470             /* We must check that we do have a valid target_dm! */
00471             if (target_dm) {
00472                 SpaceTransform loc2trgt;
00473                 float *dists_v = use_trgt_verts ? MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, dists_v") : NULL;
00474                 float *dists_e = use_trgt_edges ? MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, dists_e") : NULL;
00475                 float *dists_f = use_trgt_faces ? MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numIdx, "WeightVGProximity Modifier, dists_f") : NULL;
00476 
00477                 space_transform_setup(&loc2trgt, ob, obr);
00478                 get_vert2geom_distance(numIdx, v_cos, dists_v, dists_e, dists_f,
00479                                        target_dm, &loc2trgt);
00480                 for (i = 0; i < numIdx; i++) {
00481                     new_w[i] = dists_v ? dists_v[i] : FLT_MAX;
00482                     if (dists_e)
00483                         new_w[i] = minf(dists_e[i], new_w[i]);
00484                     if (dists_f)
00485                         new_w[i] = minf(dists_f[i], new_w[i]);
00486                 }
00487                 if (free_target_dm) target_dm->release(target_dm);
00488                 if (dists_v) MEM_freeN(dists_v);
00489                 if (dists_e) MEM_freeN(dists_e);
00490                 if (dists_f) MEM_freeN(dists_f);
00491             }
00492             /* Else, fall back to default obj2vert behavior. */
00493             else {
00494                 get_vert2ob_distance(numIdx, v_cos, new_w, ob, obr);
00495             }
00496         }
00497         else {
00498             get_vert2ob_distance(numIdx, v_cos, new_w, ob, obr);
00499         }
00500     }
00501 
00502     /* Map distances to weights. */
00503     do_map(new_w, numIdx, wmd->min_dist, wmd->max_dist, wmd->falloff_type);
00504 
00505     /* Do masking. */
00506     weightvg_do_mask(numIdx, indices, org_w, new_w, ob, dm, wmd->mask_constant,
00507                      wmd->mask_defgrp_name, wmd->modifier.scene, wmd->mask_texture,
00508                      wmd->mask_tex_use_channel, wmd->mask_tex_mapping,
00509                      wmd->mask_tex_map_obj, wmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name);
00510 
00511     /* Update vgroup. Note we never add nor remove vertices from vgroup here. */
00512     weightvg_update_vg(dvert, defgrp_idx, dw, numIdx, indices, org_w, FALSE, 0.0f, FALSE, 0.0f);
00513 
00514     /* If weight preview enabled... */
00515 #if 0 /* XXX Currently done in mod stack :/ */
00516     if (do_prev)
00517         DM_update_weight_mcol(ob, dm, 0, org_w, numIdx, indices);
00518 #endif
00519 
00520     /* Freeing stuff. */
00521     MEM_freeN(org_w);
00522     MEM_freeN(new_w);
00523     MEM_freeN(dw);
00524     if (indices)
00525         MEM_freeN(indices);
00526     MEM_freeN(v_cos);
00527 
00528 #if DO_PROFILE
00529     TIMEIT_END(perf)
00530 #endif
00531 
00532     /* Return the vgroup-modified mesh. */
00533     return dm;
00534 }
00535 
00536 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00537                                     struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00538                                     DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00539 {
00540     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00541 }
